msbt.message: Today is the fireworks show! Yaaay! I know it doesn't start until 7 PM, but I am already in fireworks mode!
Whooooossshhhhh BAAAAA-BOOM!Just thinking about the sound of fireworks makes my heart pound! Agh, is it 7 PM yet, ?!
I am SO excited for the fireworks show! Speaking of whichwhat time is it?WHAAAAAT. It's ONLY o'clock?! Ugh! Why is 7 PM taking so long to get here, ?!
The fireworks show is starting soon! Yay! Yay! Yay!Wow, my heart is beating so loud that, like, I bet folks think the show has already started, .

So, it's almost time for the fireworks show to start, and this is importantHave YOU picked out a good spot to take a photo of ME with the fireworks going off in the background? I know what you're thinking, and I agree. That photo would make a très awesome cover for my debut album!

Sometimes I get so excited before the fireworks show starts that I totally forget to breathe. Other times, I get so excited before the show that I breathe too much! In. Out. In. Out. In! Out! In! Out! Whew, I just need this show to start so I get the right amount of oxygen to my brain, .

The fireworks show was SO amaze but it flew by WAY too fast.I guess it's alright. I can just relive the whole thing by closing my eyesYeah, those fireworks were so bright I can still see them on the back of my eyelids, !
Those fireworks were très fab! I couldn't even pick a fave because they were ALL my fav!

Everyone's eyes were totes glued to the fireworks during the show. Even I couldn't tear my eyes away! So, like, I was planning to use fireworks in my debut concert. But now I'm not so sure I want everyone in the audience looking at ME, not some pretty lights, .
Guess that's the last fireworks show of the year. The wait until next year is going to be SO hard. Oooh! But at least now I can go back to being the sparkliest thing around here, !
Ugh. I am SO blue. I can't believe I have to wait a WHOLE YEAR for another fireworks show. I know! How about you snap a photo of me wallowing in despair?My cheekbones look AMAZING when I pout!

OHMIGOSH! That last fireworks show of the year was, like, off-the-charts fab, right? I can't wait to see all lit up again like that next year!Maybe it'll be even MORE lit up! If it is, I'll probably explode along with the fireworks, !
